Topic.Title: This a dead fish -- time for a short

Message.Title: Who agrees with Warren Buffett?
Message.Msg: Do you think he's wrong about this one - or should be hold on? I personally think he's correct but can't understnad why we're not 10% higher....

Message.Title: Bernanke
Message.Msg: Has killed more retirees than Hitler killed Jews.
don't rely on Warren. Rely on yourself by doing dd and research. Warren is not always right. Its just that he has lots of money and can afford a mistake now and then. Can you?

IBM is a long term hold. Warren Buffett actually hopes IBM languishes around $200 for five years. I doubt that it will as EPS is growing 13% YOY. Buy it, and leave it in your retirement portfolio, and you will be glad you did. In the past 10 years the highest one year return for IBM is 15% and the lowest is 4%. This is a low beta slow grower that allows me to sleep at night...
